snippet: California's largest community college won a reprieve on Thursday when a judge temporarily blocked a regulatory agency from stripping City College of San Francisco of its accreditation....

headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Stripping Largest California Community College of Accreditation
headline.main: Judge Blocks Stripping Largest California Community College of Accreditation

lead_paragraph: California's largest community college won a reprieve on Thursday when a judge temporarily blocked a regulatory agency from stripping City College of San Francisco of its accreditation.
